name: The Joy Of Creation Returns---V3.8
description:
You are trapped in this building again...and you are not alone, Freddy Fazbear and his friends are activating and know you're here.. survive as long as you can, good luck.*WARNING AT 50 SECONDS THE ANIMATRONICS WILL GO INTO HYPER MODE AND MOVE FASTER!!!*Sound Needed!, You need to listen for a certain sound. Just for safety, press the green lights in your office for doors.Listen for Fredbear´s Laugh!!!Its a warning before he teleports to your office!

Beware the Shadow...

Arrow Keys or "W A S D" to move. Also If one of them is trying to chase you but is stuck on a wall please just keep moving because that's cheating. Please leave a comment if you enjoyed.

I am aware that this game is FILLED with glitches and bugs..it wAs coded on scratch, and needs alot of work..i'll do my best.
